detail.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
I restore myself when I’m alone.
Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
If you are lonely when you’re alone, you are in bad company.
Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self.
It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
To live alone is the fate of all great souls.
The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone.
Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I’m most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
Solitude vivifies; isolation kills.
The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.
All men’s miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone.
It is very easy to love alone.
Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one.
It is strange to be known so universally and yet to be so lonely.
You cannot be lonely if you like the person you’re alone with.
Solitude is independence.
You only grow when you are alone.
When the people you love are gone, you’re alone.
Let your mind alone, and see what happens.
Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
A man is born alone and dies alone; and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone; and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone.
In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
I never said, ’I want to be alone.’ I only said, ’I want to be left alone.’ There is all the difference.
The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness.
You come into the world alone and you go out of the world alone yet it seems to me you are more alone while living than even going and coming.
We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life.
As I get older I’m more and more comfortable being alone.
Who knows what true loneliness is - not the conventional word but the naked terror? To the lonely themselves it wears a mask. The most miserable outcast hugs some memory or some illusion.
The best part about being alone is that you really don’t have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
Then stirs the feeling infinite, so felt In solitude, where we are least alone.
Only the lonely know the way I feel tonight.
I would rather be a beggar and single than a queen and married.

related_author: George III of the United Kingdom

detail.quote: Nothing makes us so lonely as our secrets.
To be adult is to be alone.
To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
If it’s true that our species is alone in the universe, then I’d have to say the universe aimed rather low and settled for very little.
The only real progress lies in learning to be wrong all alone.
Moon! Moon! I am prone before you. Pity me, and drench me in loneliness.
If I am a legend, then why am I so lonely?
What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
All of our unhappiness comes from our inability to be alone.
Remember we’re all in this alone.
I have so many different personalities in me and I still feel lonely.

I’ve also seen that great men are often lonely. This is understandable, because they have built such high standards for themselves that they often feel alone. But that same loneliness is part of their ability to create.
Inside myself is a place where I live all alone and that is where I renew my springs that never dry up.
Living alone makes it harder to find someone to blame.
Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone.
I think the greatest amount of pressure is the pressure I place on myself. So in a way I chose to be alone.
I was never less alone than when by myself.
I may climb perhaps to no great heights, but I will climb alone.
I want to be with those who know secret things or else alone.
Alone let him constantly meditate in solitude on that which is salutary for his soul, for he who meditates in solitude attains supreme bliss.
Your actions, and your action alone, determines your worth.

There’s a tremendous difference between alone and lonely. You could be lonely in a group of people. I like being alone. I like eating by myself. I go home at night and just watch a movie or hang out with my dog. I have to exert myself and really say, oh God, I’ve got to see my friends ’cause I’m too content being by myself.
When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.

Still and all, why bother? Here’s my answer. Many people need desperately to receive this message: I feel and think much as you do, care about many of the things you care about, although most people do not care about them. You are not alone.
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
I restore myself when I’m alone.
Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
If you are lonely when you’re alone, you are in bad company.
Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self.
It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
To live alone is the fate of all great souls.
The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone.
Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I’m most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
Solitude vivifies; isolation kills.
The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.
All men’s miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone.
It is very easy to love alone.
Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one.
It is strange to be known so universally and yet to be so lonely.
You cannot be lonely if you like the person you’re alone with.
Solitude is independence.
You only grow when you are alone.
When the people you love are gone, you’re alone.
Let your mind alone, and see what happens.
Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
A man is born alone and dies alone; and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone; and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone.
In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
I never said, ’I want to be alone.’ I only said, ’I want to be left alone.’ There is all the difference.
The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness.
You come into the world alone and you go out of the world alone yet it seems to me you are more alone while living than even going and coming.
We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life.
As I get older I’m more and more comfortable being alone.
Who knows what true loneliness is - not the conventional word but the naked terror? To the lonely themselves it wears a mask. The most miserable outcast hugs some memory or some illusion.
The best part about being alone is that you really don’t have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
Then stirs the feeling infinite, so felt In solitude, where we are least alone.
Only the lonely know the way I feel tonight.
I would rather be a beggar and single than a queen and married.
